item.title: Gemini Upgrade 2024: Focus on Boosting Power and Accessibility
item.dc:creator: ross
item.description: This is exciting news for language enthusiasts and AI users worldwide! Gemini Upgrade is here! On April 30, 2024, the Gemini mobile app received a major update that expanded its reach and accessibility worldwide. This update breaks down language barriers, making Gemini an international AI experience. The Gemini app is now available in various languages, […]
item.content:encoded:
This is exciting news for language enthusiasts and AI users worldwide! Gemini Upgrade is here! On April 30, 2024, the Gemini mobile app received a major update that expanded its reach and accessibility worldwide. This update breaks down language barriers, making Gemini an international AI experience. The Gemini app is now available in various languages, […]

The post Gemini Upgrade 2024: Focus on Boosting Power and Accessibility appeared first on Analytics Vidhya.

item.title: 8 Gemini Free Courses by Google to master it
item.dc:creator: ross
item.description: Introduction Google Gemini is one of the most popular chatbots around. And guess what? Google offers eight free lessons to help you become a Gemini pro! Whether you’re a tech enthusiast or a complete beginner, these courses cater to a wide range of learners, equipping you with the skills to leverage Gemini’s capabilities and unlock […]
item.content:encoded:
